p: We focused our analyses on the state of São Paulo, the wealthiest Brazilian state, where HCPS was first identified in 1993 and where the risk of disease increase is particularly high, due to both sugarcane expansion and climate change. São Paulo state is located in southeastern Brazil, in an area of approximately 248,210 km 2 ( Fig 1), and has a population of about 42 million, representing 21% of the Brazilian population [ 57].
